Nice shirt to wear out on date night, as business attire, etc. I went with my normal size and it fit perfectly. Not too tight, not too loose. Happy medium. The material is soft and this top has a classy look and feel to it.
Have in black and white. Great material, easy to wash and doesn’t wrinkle. Very happy!
Great material.  Very well made.  Can be casual jeans or dressy with a skirt or layered with a jacket.

This blouse is great!  The sleeves are super fun and feminine, without being overbearing.  The cut is very flattering, and the fabric does not hold wrinkles (which is a perk when trying to get ready for work quickly). Perfect top for the office, or a nice event!

Shirt is made of good quality and material and is super soft and comfortable. I like the color as pictured but the design is different in person than it is displayed on the website. Ruffles on the sleeves are cute and give an elegant look to this shirt.

The blouse is very nice. It is thin and lightweight. The green color is as expected. The size was a good fit. (Bust 38B pants/jean size 10) At the time of ordering the top was 23.99 which was okay, but is now 12.99 which seems like an adequate price.

评论概述: Satisfied-as described - runs true to soze
评论详情: This shirt has a great interlining that offered coverage,eliminates seethru, and does not result in being hot or uncomfortable.  The angel sleeves are really cute. It doesn’t wrinkle is good quality for the money fits true to size (if you are between sizes go with the larger cause the material is moderately clinging but not in a bad way) and matches pretty much everything.

评论用户: Steve Kittner --- Author of the 'What Lies' Adventure Mystery Series
评论详情: A nice top for my wife. Great for her work or with jeans for a casual night out. She loves it and so do I !  5 stars
This dress is thin, breathing, flows on the body and feels great My wife loves how it fits the body and how comfortable it feels on her

Top is on trend. Good length. Full length but not too long. Material is light to medium weight. It has some stretch but if you are busty I would size up. Overall good staple piece for your summer wardrobe but definitely can wear into fall/winter as a layering piece.

This shirt is more dressy than casual, which I like. The ribbed design and the sleeve design make it look more dressy. The top is stretchy, making it comfortable to wear. It is also soft, and it feels nice on my skin.  It is not see-through because it is made of thicker material. I could wear a black bra underneath the blouse, which wouldn't show.

The pattern is nice and the sleeves are fun and flirty, but despite being lined and a thicker-feeling material, it is still see-through. You’ll need to wear a cami underneath this one (in white, at least). It’s nice and fits well otherwise.

This shirt is great. The fabric might be a little see-through depending on the color, but the black works for me. Fits nicely around the shoulders, billowy at the bottom the way the pic shows. I was able to wash it no problem. The shoulder sleeves are a little shorter, but they do have the pleated look to them. All in all very pretty.

Like all clothing items, this showed up in a vacuum sealed bag. My wife opened the package and fell in love. This item is super soft and the material is stretchy make the top very comfortable to wear. The ribbed pattern gives it a fitted 3D designer look at budget price.This is a business casual top that could be worn with shorts as well. Machine wash cold so it doesn’t bleed or shrink. After first wash no fade of color still looks great. Top was spot on fit… true to size.  This is made from a durable material, not super thin.  Recommend

评论概述: This is such a pretty and unique top!
评论详情: This is such a pretty and unique top! It is not only pretty, it's comfortable  to wear, and easy to launder.  This top is made with soft, breathable premium fabric. I didn't have to trim any loose threads( my pet peeves). And it is manufactured well.  I would get this top again.

This Blooming Jelly Women Dressy Casual Tops Summer Short Sleeve Shirt wears like a T shirt in comfort, but adds a little oomph to your wardrobe.  This is a top I would feel comfortable in just about anywhere.  It's not too dressy - yet it's not too casual.  The fit was true to size and I ordered my regular size.  I like the texture, and it hangs really nicely, covering the back bulges.
The shoulder sleeves are gorgeous ! They definitely make the blouse stick out . I love that the material is on the thicker side . The color is a true cream.
Keep in mind, this material is not lightweight, it feels more like a thin sweater. Love the ribbed design and the shoulder cuffs. Fits easy and the V neck is perfect!

The material is definitely quality made well.  I love the design of the pattern and it fits really nice.  I actually took a chance and ordered a small because it seems to stretch really nice and I’m heavy top, but it worked out just fine.  I do plan on getting more in different colors.  It looks really nice with a pair of your favorite jeans and I add a white belt to mine. Highly recommended. 👍🏽

This shirt has interesting lines in the fabric/texture. It fits true to size, the shoulders almost feel padded. The material is thicker than I expected and not very breathable. It would be great for work or other dressier indoor events.

The shirt is pretty in person. The v-neck is not too low. Easy to dress up or down. Fabric is comfortable to wear. I would say that the sizing is oversized. I wish I had sized down. It's a bit loose. The shoulders are extra flowy and hang lower than standard sleeve length. It can kind of add bulk if you have broad shoulders. I cannot see through the shirt

The dressy top is really cute. It is unusual with the tucking and texture of the fabric. It creates subtle eye catching style. The ruffle sleeves and V neck are flattering. The shirt works well with slack and skirts for work and is also a good layering piece. The fabric is lightweight but because the of the tucking and pleating, the fabric is a lot more dense than I would suspect.
This shirt is very nice and true to size. It is made of good material, and easy to clean.

I ordered this shirt for work and im very pleased with it. I was looking for clothes i can wear casually for hanging out, going out as well as to be able to dress them up and wear for work. This shirt is well made, has a flattering cut, and loved the sleeves which help my arms look better than they actually do. I really like the feel of the fabric as well, and its a color that is easy to match with pants and accessories. I recommend this top.

This top is so fun! I love the ribbed silky material so much- it's not sheer at all and perfect for dressing a pair of jeans up or pairing with a cute skirt. The emerald green color is vibrant and gorgeous in person. I love the layered sleeve detail as it just makes it a bit more dressy than a regular tee. The v cut front isn't too low and very tasteful. I'd love this in every color- it's so comfortable and pretty!
Great dressy top for work.  It will look good with pants or jeans.  The thickness is nice, not see through.  It fits true to size.

评论用户: One of our best customers.  R.S.
评论详情: Update…. I have 3. lol yea I like  Really nice material with a little bit of stretch to make it comfortable as well. Nice fabric with a pretty texture. I went by the measurements instead of just the size and I went up a size which I didn’t have to do, but I’m glad I did because it’s really comfortable.  It’s a quality well-made top is going to make a really pretty presentation with the fancy sleeves and the textured material. It feels soft against your skin and definitely is a classy attention grabber. For the price, you can’t do better to have this as an option in your closet for a quick pretty top for casual to semi classy events

This top is nice!  It is extremely soft against your skin and it is of a substantial weight, almost like a fine gauge sweater.  The textured look adds some interest and there is enough stretch to make it very comfortable.  This top exceeded my expectations and I recommend it fully. In fairness, I cannot speak to its ability to launder well, since I have not done that yet, but I’m inclined to believe it will hold up well. If you like the looks of this tp, buy it!  You won’t be disappointed.
